beer.name: Woody Creek White Belgian Wit
beer.description: Our tribute to the town we consider to be "Gonzo Ground Zero"... Woody Creek White is a traditional Belgian-style Wit Beer, brewed with unique ingredients like orange peel and coriander, resulting in a refreshing and slightly citrus flavor, perfect for the "Dog Days of Summer".
beer.grains: Belgian Pilsner, Malted White Wheat, Oats, Unmalted Wheat, Flaked Wheat, Flaked Oats
Belgian Pilsner, Malted White Wheat, Oats, Unmalted Wheat, Flaked Wheat, Flaked Oats
